name: Burden Of Bravery
description:
Burden of Bravery is a lore rich, Virtual Reality (VR) horror game.

In this horror experience you are to brave the dark forest, the daunting catacombs, the secrets of the mages quarters and something in the dark. You are an adventurer looking for gold and glory when you stumble upon this ancient place.

Controls:

Left Joystick is continuous movement

Right joystick is to rotate the camera

Grip to pick up key items

Teleport is disabled in this build

Instructions are found in the Hub world

All interactable objects have a sheen on them and are Physics based so pressing it with an object will activate its effect.
